name: Dreamforce Escape Room Activation
description: Watson Knowledge Base Chatbot for Dreamforce 2018 Activation Event

values.text: The science officer for this cryogenics pod bay (13354L) is Dr. Stephen Cordero. Shall I page him?
System Error.  Message returned is below:  {"StatusCode":"Error", "ErrorMsg":"Unable to Connect to Database at location DB2 SAMPLE::services-uscentral.skytap.com:9247"}.  Resetting interface
For more information about the system database - enter in `database info` or a phrase like it into the terminal

Unfortunately location information on Dr. Stephen Cordero is not available.  Error is below:  { "ResponseCode":"Error", "ErrorMsg":"Unable to Connect to Database at location DB2 SAMPLE::services-uscentral.skytap.com:9247"}
For more information about the system database - enter in `database info` or a phrase like it into the terminal

I am happy to provide this information for you citizen :)  Message structure to submit a manual door opening request is a simple JSON structure that includes 2 key pieces of information.   A valid user id,and  an access token.  If you would like the exact specifications, please type in 'door open requirements' without the quotes.
The DFAUSER table is a table that lists the internal information about the Science Officers in this facility.  Information in this table is confidential and requires special access.
None of the Cryosystem APIs can be called without first getting an Authentication token from the Authentication  Token API.
Information for Authentication Token API can be found here:  https://alley28.github.io/dfa2018/auth_token_api_doc.html

Database access is restricted, but if you have the proper credentials, you can access the main database here:   DB Name is SAMPLE, and the required URL to access the DB server is services-uscentral.skytap.com:9247

tables available are: ACT - Activity Table CATALOG - Cryovault Catalog CL_SCHED - Schedule CUSTOMER - Customer  DEPARTMENT - Department DFAUSER - Science Officer User Table **CONFIDENTIAL** EMPLOYEE - Employees EMPMDC - Employee Mandate   Error â€” Network Stream Failure.  Command Reset

In case of emergencies, cryobay door opening can be submitted manually using a JSON messaging structure that will be submitted using an API Call.  Would you like instructions on how to accomplish this?
All citizen-volunteers should wait for their Respective Cryogenics Science Officer to be let out of their chambers once they exit cryosleep.

An JSON Structure must be Sent to the Door Open Override API. Within the JSON Request, you must enter in the user name for the request.  This can be retrieved from the main cryo chamber database management system.   Next, you will need an authorization token from the Authorization Token API Service.  Enter in 'authorization token' (without the quotes) to get those requirements.
Requirements for calling the Door Open Override API can be found here:  https://alley28.github.io/dfa2018/door_overide_api_doc.html
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
Hello Citizen.  My Name is Watson and I am the facilities management platform for this location.  On behalf of a grateful world,  we thank you for your sacrifice.  How can I help you today?
